summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6054 for the improvement of Hudson Street from 1st Avenue South to a connection with the existing pavement approximately 287 feet east thereof; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 82693, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
